caption: Food was good but the service is slow
Food was good but the service is slow.
Good food but slow service.

Had an amazing time here for a double date. The staff was incredible and helpful. Tables were cleaned swiftly. The cocktails like the hot honey, apple smash and queen bee were great. Clams appetizer was delicious and the lamb + pork milanese mains were just as good. Highly recommend if you're looking for new, modern Italian.
absolutely delicious. pork milanese, squid ink pasta and the burrata are to die for. might be one of my top 5 appetizers ever. hunter was a great host and gave excellent recommendations.

One of NYC's finest hidden gems. Very comfortable, quaint atmosphere. The whole menu is worthy of praise and the cocktails are to die for. I recommend the Longshoreman to all of my friends visiting the city. Keep it up guys!

Love this place. Great little spot with a fresh in-season menu. Wonderful ambiance and friendly staff. Homemade pasta and wood fired pizzas, what’s better than that? Plus the cocktail program is on point. Highly recommend.

A very unique, creative, and distinctive local Italian restaurant. The whole experience of dining at the Longshoreman is a great experience. I recommend coming in and having any of the pizzas paired with their great selection of entrees. I love this restaurant and hope anyone who comes in enjoys it as much as I do.

The Longshoreman has been one of my favorites since moving to the neighborhood. The food is always fantastic. The drinks always hit the spot. However the best part of Longshoreman are the people and hospitality. You will always feel comfortable and welcomed.
Longshoreman is open and better than ever!!

hands down best restaurant in the neighborhood. amazing food & bar, better staff, the funniest stories!! highly recommend going for it all — dinner, brunch, happy hour, everything. you’ll find yourself coming back, often
Comfortable ambiance, chic decor, great food crafted by local chefs. Their pizzas are very tasty and fresh, fresh ingredients, and the bar is comfortable to sit at and grab a drink. Great date spot
My favorite local place! The service and food are always excellent. The late night happy hour specials are a great way to wind down the day. Everything I order here is always delicious.

This place is a hidden gem in Brooklyn. I love the ambiance of this place. We were warmly greeted by staff and seated promptly. I tried quite a few of their specialty cocktails and they were fun and delicious. Great food and overall good vibes.  Perfect place to catch up with friends, date night, weekend brunch or if you’re just in the mood for great cocktails!
The food here is soooo good!! Especially recently. These days I only get takeout and I could eat from the longshoreman every day.
Amazing food and service. Don’t miss out on this gem.
Great atmosphere, delicious food , perfect service.

Great Execution on Modern Italian Cuisine... Staff is always a pleasure and extremely attentive... Get the Homemade Bread it’s life changing! I’ve been here for Brunch, Lunch and everything in between! Great ambiance to grab a cocktail as well!

Amazing food, amazing staff and the owners are lovely!  My wife and I are obsessed with the Pappardelle and the Pork Chop.  The pizza is great too, I even peeped them on the Barstool Pizza Review which is always fun to see your favorite neighborhood spot being highlighted!  The drinks are creative spins on classic cocktails which keeps it interesting and the Wine selection is incredible.  Half off bottles of wine on Wednesday’s and they offer a Late Night Happy Hour!  Highly recommended!
amazing food! great service! will be back!

Amazing spin on classic Italian! Delicious, fresh food and wonderful service! The fennel salad, Pappardelle, and Artichoke pizza are some of our favorites, but we always look forward to their exciting specials! Great drinks too! They even have negronis on tap! If you haven’t been, The Longshoreman should be next on your list!
What a exceptional experience!! The food and drinks are amazing. The staff is very friendly as well. I’ll be seeing you guys again very soon.

If you want a wonderful dining experience, visit The Longshoreman. Our cocktails were delicious and refreshing, a perfect way to kick-off our night. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable, giving us excellent recommendations. If I could live off their Ricotta della Casa, I would. And to top of an already remarkable meal, our dessert was a mindblowing Lemon Olive Oil Cake. I cannot wait to return!

Wonderful Experience! Fantastic service and even better food with an intimate feel. From the appetizers to the pizzas and the desserts everything is perfect! My favorite place in NY to meet with friends.
The food, service and ambiance was great, can’t wait to go back!

The longshoreman exceeded our expectations! The service and ambiance can not be beat. The menu has options for many pallets and they were able to cater to our many food allergies ! We can’t wait to go back !
Great menu, cocktails and service!
Amazing food and fast, friendly service!

My boyfriend & I went here while I was on a diet & I haaaaaaad to get the fresh pizza. Safe to say - diet was broken & I’m so glad it was because everything was BOMB - including the fresh handmade drinks!! Awesome spot for a date night or just to hangout with some friends. The staff is super friendly too, so definitely will keep coming back :)
This place has amazing food and drinks in an inviting atmosphere. I would highly recommend The Longshoreman. Definitely a great find!
Has the best pasta dishes ever and home made! The ambiance is amazing and the staff is phenomenal
Food and service is amazing !!! Loved my experience 5 stars !! Ask for Brandon

Your go to spot for uhhhh—-mazing  drinks ... I recommend the jalapeño margarita ... the brick oven artichoke pizza sits great on your tastebuds just keeps you drooling to finish it off gotta add some corn on cob with the delicious sauce *authentic* #missioncomplete
I really enjoyed dining here. Nice staff,  clean interior, and most importantly: GREAT food. I highly recommend the pizza!
Smaller restaurant with a solid atmosphere. Food was excellent - highly recommend the burger or pizzas. Exactly what I want on a Saturday night.
Great food, great executive chef, good ppl, nice environment,

We loved everything about The Longshoreman. As a brussels sprouts connoisseur, I give theirs a high mark. The craft cocktails are stout, yet delicious and made with fresh/clean ingredients. And the service was excellent. I highly recommend popping in for dinner, a drink, or both.
Birthday activities
A great restaurant in the Columbia Waterfront Area with the best staff and  ownership.   They make an amazing burger!

Small but comfortable. Service is top shelf. From appetizers to coffee and dessert  the food was outstanding. A wonderful dining experience. The only downside is parking. Make sure to call for reservations since seating is limited
Excellent food and service. Definitely recommend
The food is really good, the waiters and waitresses are nice, but the food can take a while depending on what you ordered.

We've been meaning to try out the Longshoreman for a while and we're very happy that we did. They were busy earlyish on a Saturday night but managed to find us a spot at the bar. Our favorite dishes were the clam special (I hope this dish finds its way to the regular menu because I would go back and eat it at least once a week)  the pork chop and the burger. The service was very good. The food came out really quickly.  If you want to guarantee yourself table you may want to book one on a busier night. It's nice to have another good restaurant in the neighborhood and to see a restaurant on Columbia Street doing well.
Great atmosphere to go with brick oven pizzas and great cocktail selection.
Gnocchi and heirloom tomato pizza were amazing
Great staff, strong drinks, delicious food.
Amazing scallops dish!
Very cosy spot with great decor and good ambiance. Only came for drinks, but they were great.

Literally everything we ordered was delicious. Amazing food, service, and atmosphere will be back very soon to try the other half of the menu. Some must haves were the rosemary sea salt bread and ricotta, the asparagus, and the Uni Cacio Pepe.
Wonderful ambience, great service & outstanding food! With all the restaurants NYC has to offer, I would definitely come back to this one! Great experience overall!
Awesome place with a great atmosphere. Great service and great food
Excellent food and amazing service!

Great place & nice staff! Addendum: They have expanded their menu and we liked the food very much, even though it is quite on the pricey side. Nevertheless the attention to detail and obvious care for their customers make up for it.
Service 🔥
A go to spot for amazing food. Nothing disappoints!
Great food
So far only here for drinks, but love the menu and the beer list is excellent.  Cannot wait to try it for a full meal.

This place is a real gem for the neighborhood. We've been there for both dinner and brunch and the food is just outstanding. I've probably had 4 or 5 different dishes from here and they are all unbelievable. Then to top it off, the manager Troy provides top notch service and he's just an overall nice and friendly person. This restaurant takes pride in their food and service and it all adds up to an amazingly pleasurable dining experience
Great atmosphere and delicious food.
Great food. Very friendly staff. Good cocktails. Great bloody mary

Amazing! Attentive service, knowledgeable staff, flavorful fare (the gnocchi were like little pillows of heaven) , warm atmosphere, great location, artfully made drinks, sensational desserts, and hands down the best espresso I've ever had. I can't wait to go back and try their brick oven pizza.

SO glad we tried The Longshoreman this weekend for Brunch! The food was so good, great beer and wine selection and they were accomodating to our stroller as well. Staff and manager were super nice. I wouldn't count on there being room for the stroller every time, but we got there when there was room. We had a great time!
Great neighborhood place with delicious food and service. Lovely vibe.

My boo and I unanimously decided.... this is OUR NEW SPOT. Consider us "the regulars". The only thing better than the food was the staff! Greeted us by name each time, smiled all night, knew we were ready for a clean up before we knew it! I almost don't want yo ahare this little gem, I need to make sure a table is always available for us! Oh.... and the amaretto sours..... lawd! The hand made pizza.... christ! Can't wait to catch brunch
This place was great, but I didn’t love some of the items we ordered. It’s new and still working out the menu, so I would definitely come back again. Pizza was delish, and staff was awesome.
Amazing food. Great decor
Lovely food - especially the gnocchi!
Margarita pizza A+ great room friendly staff. Thank you!
Fantastic food, great beer and cocktail selection! Amazing addition to the neighborhood, Red Hook has been waiting for a good brick oven pizzeria as well and it’s finally here!
